events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position with complete resume and cover letter.
The application has been categorized under Engineering as the candidate clearly meets the software engineering role criteria.
Recruiter James has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process to ensure smooth communication and evaluation.
Initial phone screening conducted; the candidate demonstrated good knowledge of software development fundamentals.
Candidate promptly responded to our interview scheduling email, expressing enthusiasm and availability for the technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for April 7th; this will cover coding skills, system design, and problem-solving abilities.
The technical interview was completed successfully; candidate showed strong coding skills and good problem-solving approach.
An HR interview has been scheduled for April 9th to evaluate candidate's cultural fit and soft skills.
HR interview completed; candidate aligns well with company values and demonstrated good communication and collaboration skills.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and start date details, showing our keen interest.
Candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed excitement about joining the engineering team.
Candidate formally accepted the offer and confirmed the agreed-upon start date, finalizing the hiring stage.
Onboarding process started with welcome sessions, account setups, and introductory meetings arranged for the new hire.
Hiring process closed successfully after smooth onboarding; the candidate is now a fully integrated member of the engineering team.
